title: panic: runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference
body:
#### System information

Geth version: `geth version` 1.6.2
OS & Version: Windows Windows 64bit
Commit hash : (if `develop`)

#### Expected behaviour
No error!!!

#### Actual behaviour
INFO [05-31|10:59:07] Imported new chain segment               blocks=1  txs=93   mgas=4.295   elapsed=444.071ms mgasps=9.672   number=3798991 hash=c268e1â€¦84d739

````
[backtrace]
````

Same problem here, happens when I initiate a "reveal ens bid" transaction.
